element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm calculates the Perpendicular Vegetation Index (PVI) based on Perry and Lautenschlager, 1984.
To calculate this index, a soil line is needed. A soil line is produces through linear regression of the near-infrared band and the red band for a sample of bare soil pixels.
